Title: Detour
Plot: While on their way to an FBI group communication seminar, Mulder and Scully manage to escape when they come across a situation in the Florida forest area where three men have recently disappeared.
GuestStars: Colleen Flynn, Anthony Rapp, Scott Burkholder, J.C. Wendel, Tyler Thompson, Merrilyn Gann, Alfred E. Humphreys, Tom Scholte, Simon Longmore
